descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Oro Verde Manta! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.With a perfect beachfront location facing the Pacific Ocean, Hotel Oro Verde offers neatly decorated rooms with free WiFi, just 1.2 mi from the Eloy Alfaro Airport.The 5-star Oro Verde has an outdoor swimming pool surrounded with sun loungers and a well-appointed gym with weights and cardiovascular equipment. Young guests can enjoy the fenced-off playground with slides.All air-conditioned rooms at the Oro Verde come with a cable TV, laptop safe box and well-stocked mini-bar, while the private private bathroom also offers a hairdryer.Mixed cuisine and grilled seafood is served on the outdoor terrace of Pata Salada Restaurant, with panoramic views of the Pacific and Manta Harbor. The hotel’s deli offers pastries and a sushi restaurant is also on site.Oro Verde Hotel is just 10 blocks from downtown Manta and provides free private parking on site.
direccion: Malecon Y Calle 23, S130502 Manta, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

comentarios.p_comentario: Todo me gustó. Excelente atención. La comida fenomenal.
las habitaciones y la comodidad en todos los espacios n/a
La primera noche no tenía señal de internet en mi habitación. Al siguiente día me ubicaron en una gran suite espectacular, muy cómoda. Fue un buen detalle.
Excelente atención zona muy segura todos muy amables la comida excelente Todo estuvo excelente
basen, sauna, jacuzi, brak izolacji od bardzo głośnej i ruchliwej ulicy

great modern property with beach access and a fully equipped gym! Service is superb!
great staff and property! would def stay again :)
 The mattress was too soft to sleep in and the lunch buffet a tad overpriced.

To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Boasting an outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant with panoramic beach views, Balandra offers rooms and bungalows with garden views in Manta. Wi-Fi is free and El Murciélago Beach is 100 m away. Gym facilities are available.Hotel Cabañas Balandra has air-conditioned accommodations with cable TV and private bathrooms. Both rooms and bungalows feature private balconies.A daily buffet breakfast is offered for a surcharge, and the restaurant also offers room service.There is 24-hour front desk assistance and private parking is free. Eloy Alfaro Airport is 3.7 mi away, while Del Pacífico Shopping Mall is 100 m away.

Nice room with a good bathroom. Very green territory
Exceptional
 We ordered the room with sea view. Unfortunately the hotel is not on the first line so the sea view was only above the building. So the view was not so fine
Excelente la atención, instalaciones limpias, ubicación central, habitaciones amplias y sobre todo el desayuno buffet muy sabroso y variado.
buena atención de todos todo bien

Andres Zavala was an excellent tour guide and driver. He is our Amigo!. He is a wonderful man who took very good care of my family. He was a great tour guide. Selena was very helpful with checking us in and making our stay top notch! The staff and service were excellent and the hotel and restaurant were great! I highly recommend Hotel Balandra.
Top Notch Service and Hotel
 The noise was loud through the floor. The room above our room, we could hear every footstep and they had kids running around latenight and early. And there was some construction for a couple days that was loud jackhammering.
Muy buen trato del personal del hotel, cabaña espectacular
desayuno no hubo servicio de recolección desde el aeropuerto

Great hotel with super nice facilities, lush and tropical gardens, and rooms are clean and spacious. 
Although the pool isn´t big, it`s heated what makes it very pleasant. Our kids loved the playground. 
Breakfast is fantastic, and all the staff at the restaurant, customer-oriented, very helpful, and friendly. 
Special thanks also for Maria José, she is wonderful and made us and our kids feel very welcome.  
We definitely return!
Perfect place to stay in Manta
El servicio del personal fue espectacular. Es oscura la suite.

Everything was great.
Great hotle, great, friendly staff
 Lots of steps for me.
Nos encantó el ambiente del hotel las distintas áreas temáticas cómo el túnel del amor y la piscina es hermosa.
el trato tan cálido de los colaboradores, en especial de María José

El servicio de los colaboradores fue excelente, fuimos con mi bebé de 9 meses y todos nos ayudaban con lo q se necesitaba, la comida muy rica y las habitaciones limpias y acogedoras.
Tienen un parque infantil lindisimo Calibrar el agua caliente en la duchas nos costó un poco ya q se demoraba en temperarse.

The wonderful breakfast exceeded our expectations but also the beautiful view in the morning from the lovely terrace.
Great romantic place. No Wi-Fi.
 The Wi-Fi did not exist. Or it felt that way being that it. Did not work the entire stay.

descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Poseidon! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Only a couple of steps away from the beach, Hotel Poseidon offers accommodations in Manta. This property's privileged location allows guests to relax in the outdoor infinity swimming pool with uninterrupted sea views. Guests are offered complimentary shuttle services to and from Manta Airport.Free WiFi access is available throughout this property.Rooms at Hotel Poseidon feature a clean decoration with cheerful colors. Rooms are fitted with private bathroom facilities with free toiletries, a mini-bar, a safety-deposit box and a flat-screen TV with satellite channel. Rooms also provide air-conditioning. Some rooms have a balcony providing sea views.Additionally, Hotel Poseidon features an on-site restaurant and bar, where guests can unwind and savor exciting local flavors.This property also provides guests with free access to its facilities, which include the outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub, a fitness center and a solarium. The property also has a communal sun terrace, where guests can enjoy some sun rays and the panoramic sea views.Hotel Poseidon has a 24-hour front desk service, prepared to help guests with any requirements they may have. A complimentary luggage storage service is also available here.Free private parking is available on site.Murciélago Beach is 901 m from Hotel Poseidon. Manta Airport is 5 mi from the property.Shuttle services are available at a surcharge.

descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hostal El Naufrago 1! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Located in Manta, a 17-minute walk from Barbasquillo, Hostal El Naufrago 1 provides accommodations with a bar, free private parking, a shared lounge and a garden. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a grill. The property has a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.At the guesthouse, every room includes a closet. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all guest rooms at Hostal El Naufrago 1 have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms will provide you with a seating area.Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.Hostal El Naufrago 1 has a sun terrace.Popular points of interest near the guesthouse include El Murcielago Beach, Ciudadela Santa Martha and Tarqui. The nearest airport is Eloy Alfaro International Airport, 10.9 km from Hostal El Naufrago 1.

comentarios.p_comentario:
Very clean, good lighting, spacious. When they found they didn't have the single room with two beds that we requested, they gave us two rooms at no extra charge.
They went out of their way to make us comfortable, even though we stayed only a night.

The Location is very nice. Right outside you have the Bus number 17 who drives along the coast in the city (mall, terminal, playa). 
The Lady is super friendly and helps you with all. The room is very clean!
Perfect Location
 The commun kitchen is dirty and does not have a lot of things..
Es la segunda vez que me hospedo porque me encantó todo.. las habitaciones súper limpias y cómodas.... Todo está excelente..
personnel pas sympathique, endroit bruyant (personnel bruyant ), chambre sale et ne correspondait pas aux critères. Parking non surveillé. petit déjeuner pas terrible.

Personal amable.
Buenas camas.
Ducha con agua caliente.
Tv con Netflix.
Desayuno muuuuy bueno. Le doy unos puntos menos por qué al querer pagar con tarjeta te quieren cobrar más. El personal indica que es por qué el servicio "le cobra al cliente un porcentaje de la transacción" y no, el cliente no es el que usa el servicio para su negocio, lo usa el hospedaje, con lo cual se supone que sus precios ya están acomodados para todos esos "gastos" el resto todo bien.
La cama era muy dura, tenía televisión pero no se podía acceder al wifi en el televisor para tener señal de ningún tipo

Tenia una excelente ubicación ya que estaba solo a minutos de todo, y el sector muy tranquilo , el desayuno muy bueno Hubo un pequeño inconveniente con las habitaciones pero de resto todo estuvo muy bien

It finally turned out to be ok.  The hotel was clean. The room was fine. The staff were nice.
Very Good
 When I arrived for my reservation at Naufrago 1, they said there wasn't a room for me.  The hotel was full.  I showed them my Booking.com confirmation information, and they said there were people staying at the hotel who needed an additional room, and they gave them mine.  This is not ok.  I've used Booking.com for many years, and this was the only time my reservation wasn't accepted. The person working called the owner, who drove to the hotel to talk to me.  He said it was a holiday, and there were no other hotel rooms available in Manta, but he could offer me a room in his other hotel, and drive me there.  He was very nice, and took me to his other hotel.  But I was quite annoyed that they had my reservation, and gave it to someone else.

Clean, comfortable bed, helpful and friendly staff. Mu question at the end of a stay is “would I
choose to go back?” and in this case the a answer is a definite yes. Great value for the price.
An excellent choicd for an economical, comfortable, clean and simple sccomodstion

Todo muy bien. Estilo Moderno. Muy buena atención. Piscina. Limpio. Buen parqueo. Seguro. Etc

La relación calidad precio es de lo mejor, instalaciones nuevas, la habitación amplia, cómoda y limpia. La piscina al aire libre y grande, amplio parqueadero, el desayuno muy sabroso y el personal muy atento. Esta lejos de la playa y zonas comerciales, no tiene ascensor.

descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Perla Spondylus! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Only 500 m from El Murcielago Beach, Hotel Perla Spondylus offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. Free parking is also available. You can find our restaurante "Marthas Cocina Casual on 1st floor and enjoy food and drinks by the pool as well. The commercial area is 100 m away from the hotelBright and spacious, rooms at Hotel Perla Spondylus have large windows overlooking the sea. All of them have air conditioning and private bathrooms.Breakfast a la carte is served daily and includes regional fruits, bread, and cereals. Regional specialties can be ordered at the property’s restaurant.Hotel Perla Spondylus is 500 m from Manta’s Cultural Museum and 6.2 mi from Eloy Alfaro International Airport. comentarios.p_comentario: El desayuno, la comodida de la habitacion y la ubicacion fueron 3 cosas excepcionales La piscina se ensucia mucho y el televisor es netamente decorativo

The King Suite had a bathtub in the room! Very nice room layout with great views of the Manta Port. Comfortable bed and very hot water in a very nice shower. The restaurant exceeded expectations with great food and unique cocktails... worth going to dinner there even if you don't stay.
Fantastic Manta Port views with an epic bathtub.
 The balcony wasn't as private as some options in Manta, but I think this is only true on the top floor of rooms. Sight distance to a neighboring room, and connected to a room behind (but blocked by a plant). Location is also fairly urban... expect normal traffic noise as opposed to the sound of the ocean.

La habitación grande, las camas cómodas, y tenía una vista maravillosa del puerto de Manta.
El desayuno y servicio de restaurante muy buenos. Tuvieron un lindo detalle con una de mis hijas, por su cumpleaños La piscina es algo pequeña.

impresionante la atención de todo el personal! súper destacable todos y en todo momento! 
buenas instalaciones, todo limpio, muy bueno el desayuno y restaurante nada

Estuvo bien el desayuno.
en cuanto a la ubicación, pese a estar cerca del mejor centro comercial, también esta junto a un barrio en malas condiciones sanitarias y urbanística. Que instalen pronto un restaurante, pues como indicaba está cerca de un barrio, que al salir a algunos locales cercanos de comida, a uno le da recelo.

La habitación estaba limpia y las instalaciones cómodas, el personal nos ayudó para conseguir taxis, la ubicación muy buena cerca del puerto y de lugares de diversión y comida. Todo estuvo bien.
Me gusto su atencion y sobre todo estaban atendiendo en la madrugada, que tuve que salir temprano no me Gusto que alas 4 am  no hubo agua, y necesitaba salir de urgencia
Excelente ubicación a 5 minutos de la playa, zona segura Todo bien
limpieza y atención entrada incómoda el escalón

Apartamento habitación pequeña para ejecutivos o parejas
comentarios.p_comentario: Todo impecable y nuevo! Hay plancha para ropa, secador de cabello, refrigerador, mesa para trabajar en la compu, suficientes toallas, agua caliente, el aire acondicionado funciona perfecto. Me quedé una semana por trabajo y la seguridad buenísima, pude dejar los equipos de trabajo y dormir tranquila. Hay parqueadero seguro, buen Internet, Netflix y lo mejor los dueños siempre disponibles. El día del chek out me permitieron estar en la habitación hasta la hora de mi vuelo, increíble!!! Ahhh y la ubicación excelente. Volveré!!!

comentarios.nombreh_id: Apartamento habitación pequeña para ejecutivos o parejas

descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hostal Manakin! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Located in Manta, 250 from Murciélago Beach, Hostal Manakin offers a free daily breakfast along with free WiFi access and parking. The property is a 10-minute drive from Eloy Alfaro Airport.Each air-conditioned room here includes a flat-screen cable TV, soundproofing and a work desk along with an ironing station and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.Hostal Manakin has a fitness center and a bar and restaurant. It also features a shared lounge area, a garden and a designated smoking area. Daily housekeeping and a laundry service are also included.
direccion: Calle 20 Avenida 12, 130802 Manta, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

comentarios.p_comentario: De kamer was schoon en het personeel was vriendelijk. Het hotel ligt pal naast een groot winkelcentrum en winkels.
La ubicación del hostal Difícil de ubicarlo, y la dificultad de entrar y salir.
Absolutamente todo desde su personal hasta la pizza preparada en la cafetería que tienen ahí mismo. Es un lugar muy acogedor Nada
la limpieza, restaurante, ubicacion el tamaño del baño, incomodo
Su ubicación, cerca al mall y cerca a la playa del murciélago La tele no tenía canales nacionales al menos, a uno le gusta ver las noticias y ciertos programas
La decoracion y el personal amable
estaban haciendo trabajos y arreglos de construcción en la habitación de junto y hacían  mucho ruido desde muy temprano y no pude descansar.
La tranquilidad y el ambiente familiar

The location is good
Poor
 the room did not have a window, also we found bugs in my bed, when i mentioned it they told me they where having problems since they where updating the rooms in the back.

descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Departamentos de 2 y 3 Habitaciones en el Centro de MANTA! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Located in Manta with Tarqui Beach and El Murcielago Beach nearby, Departamentos de 2 y 3 Habitaciones en el Centro de MANTA provides accommodations with free WiFi and free private parking.Accommodations are fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge.Popular points of interest near the apartment include Los Esteros, Manta and Miraflores. The nearest airport is Eloy Alfaro International Airport, 6.9 km from Departamentos de 2 y 3 Habitaciones en el Centro de MANTA.
nombre_id: Departamentos de 2 y 3 Habitaciones en el Centro de MANTA

descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Premier Inn! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Hotel Premier Inn is located on the beachfront in Manta, a 5-minute walk from Los Esteros and 549 m from Tarqui Beach. Featuring a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides karaoke and a 24-hour front desk.Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. At Hotel Premier Inn every room is equipped with bed linen and towels.El Murcielago Beach is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Manta Harbor is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Eloy Alfaro International, 6 km from Hotel Premier Inn, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
direccion: Calle 107 Avenida 105 #108, 130804 Manta, Ecuador–Good location – show map

comentarios.p_comentario:
Covid  has suspended breakfast time.
Very Good
La atención es muy buena!  100% recomendado
La atención de los dueños. Son amables El colchón y almohadas

comfy room and bed, hot shower, close to beach
convenient and adequate but overpriced
 owners not very helpful
El personal del turno de mañana fue muy poco amable. No merece las cuatro estrellas que tiene.
La atencion de la persona que nos recibio Las camas sonaban, no entra la señal de internet al cuarto y se fue la luz y no tienen planta
La limpieza, y que se ofrecieran a guiarnos para buscar restaurantes o direcciones cercanas.

The hotel is the hidden gem of the city of Tarqui, it has a luxurious feel as soon as you walk in. The room was better than advertise, not only confortable but also with a home feel to it. It was like sleeping at my own home.
The most luxurious place you will find at a budget price.

The location by the beach was nice. Most mornings when there is not much to do a simple walk makes your stay feel more homely. You definitely get a feel of the culture at this location. 
---
La ubicación junto a la playa era agradable. En las mañanas cuando no hay mucho que hacer uno simplemente camina hacia la playa. Definitivamente tiene sentido de la cultura. Like the rest of the world currently we are all restricted by Covid. Our hosts informed us of the karaoke nights they sometimes host for guests. Unfortunately, we did not get to experience this.  --- Al igual que el resto del mundo actualmente todos estamos restringidos por el Covid. Nuestros anfitriones nos informaron de las noches de karaoke que a veces organizan para los huéspedes. Desafortunadamente, no pudimos experimentar esto.

Location was once again very beautiful. Definitely loved coming here and being able to bring people with me. Love the hotel and the way it Is managed.
one of my favorite places to be
 I liked everything about it so theres not much I can say about disliking it. Definitely recommend this hotel to anyone going on vacation to ecuador.

agua caliente la habitación muy estrecha pra 3 personas. cuando hice la selección de hotel, marqué que tuviera desayuno opción que no tiene. la habitación daba a la calle y a lado había un tienda que tomaban, gritaban y ponían música alta
la atención personalizada por parte de la administración, una persona muy gentil, un buen lugar como para trabajar, hay internet rápido mesas, y servicio premiun
